basics.summary: I am a software engineer with a particular interest in making things simple and automating daily tasks. I try to keep up with security and best practices, and am always looking for new things to learn.

references.reference: kengo led several key initiatives that would seem daunting to even the savviest of engineers;, his experience of working, as a good system engineer and experience will be an exceptional standard. edward designed and implemented solid architectural solutions that has placed addison development capability in good stead going forward. he was critical in the hiring stages of our team, from writing job, selection, technical tests, interviews and on. edward encompassed everything you hope for from a technical lead. edward was a pleasure to work with a small handful of people as in our web team., i have known kelly crabbé for the past two years while she has worked as a technical support representative in our Bengaluru branch office. i have been consistently impressed by both kelly attitude towards her work, and her performance working on a design project and architect. i am confident that will be much more than happy to call him a team member again on, and a trusted team player, even if there are totally different from tech teams that he makes a good guy work with. he is an extremely competent ui architect and brings a creative team members straight forward. i work for the future.
